article_title: Deducting Medical Expenses On Your Tax Return

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: Paying for hospital stays and other out of pocket medical expenses can be expensive. What can you deduct on your tax return? And what if those expenses aren't for you but for someone else like your parents? Here's what's deductible (and what's not).
og.title: Heart Surgery & Hospital Stays: Deducting Medical Expenses On Your Tax Return
